item.title: NHL Predictions - February 14, 2020
item.description: These predictions are created using an ELO Model. More information on my methodology is coming in a future post. Table 1: NHL Predictions - February 14, 2020 Date Home Visitor Probability Home Team Wins Probability Away Team Wins 891 2020-02-14 Carolina Hurricanes New Jersey Devils 62.7% 37.3% 892 2020-02-14 Columbus Blue Jackets New York Rangers 58.
